00049 
00050 Line::Line() {}
00051 
00052 
00053 Line::Line(const Position& p1, const Position& p2)
00054     : myP1(p1), myP2(p2) {}
00055 
00056 
00057 Line::~Line() {}
00058 
00059 
00060 void
00061 Line::extrapolateBy(SUMOReal length) {
00062     SUMOReal factor = length / myP1.distanceTo(myP2);
00063     Position offset = (myP2 - myP1) * factor;
00064     myP1.sub(offset);
00065     myP2.add(offset);
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 void
00070 Line::extrapolateFirstBy(SUMOReal length) {
00071     myP1 = GeomHelper::extrapolate_first(myP1, myP2, length);
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 void
00076 Line::extrapolateSecondBy(SUMOReal length) {
00077     myP2 = GeomHelper::extrapolate_second(myP1, myP2, length);
00078 }
00079 
00080 const Position&
00081 Line::p1() const {
00082     return myP1;
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 const Position&
00087 Line::p2() const {
00088     return myP2;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 Position
00093 Line::getPositionAtDistance(SUMOReal offset) const {
00094     SUMOReal length = myP1.distanceTo(myP2);
00095     if (length == 0) {
00096         if (offset != 0) {
00097             throw InvalidArgument("Invalid offset " + toString(offset) + " for Line with length " + toString(length));;
00098         }
00099         return myP1;
00100     }
00101     return myP1 + ((myP2 - myP1) * (offset / length));
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 void
00106 Line::move2side(SUMOReal amount) {
00107     std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal> p = GeomHelper::getNormal90D_CW(myP1, myP2, amount);
00108     myP1.add(p.first, p.second);
00109     myP2.add(p.first, p.second);
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 DoubleVector
00114 Line::intersectsAtLengths2D(const PositionVector& v) {
00115     PositionVector p = v.intersectionPoints2D(*this);
00116     DoubleVector ret;
00117     for (size_t i = 0; i < p.size(); i++) {
00118         ret.push_back(myP1.distanceTo2D(p[int(i)]));
00119     }
00120     return ret;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 SUMOReal
00125 Line::atan2Angle() const {
00126     return atan2(myP1.x() - myP2.x(), myP1.y() - myP2.y());
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 SUMOReal
00131 Line::atan2DegreeAngle() const {
00132     return (SUMOReal) atan2(myP1.x() - myP2.x(), myP1.y() - myP2.y()) * (SUMOReal) 180.0 / (SUMOReal) PI;
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 SUMOReal
00137 Line::atan2PositiveAngle() const {
00138     SUMOReal angle = atan2Angle();
00139     if (angle < 0) {
00140         angle = (SUMOReal) PI * (SUMOReal) 2.0 + angle;
00141     }
00142     return angle;
00143 }

00145 Position
00146 Line::intersectsAt(const Line& l) const {
00147     return GeomHelper::intersection_position(myP1, myP2, l.myP1, l.myP2);
00148 }
00149 
00150 
00151 bool
00152 Line::intersects(const Line& l) const {
00153     return GeomHelper::intersects(myP1, myP2, l.myP1, l.myP2);
00154 }

00157 SUMOReal
00158 Line::length2D() const {
00159     return myP1.distanceTo2D(myP2);
00160 }

00162 
00163 SUMOReal
00164 Line::length() const {
00165     return myP1.distanceTo(myP2);
00166 }

00169 void
00170 Line::add(SUMOReal x, SUMOReal y) {
00171     myP1.add(x, y);
00172     myP2.add(x, y);
00173 }

00175 
00176 void
00177 Line::add(const Position& p) {
00178     myP1.add(p.x(), p.y());
00179     myP2.add(p.x(), p.y());
00180 }

00183 void
00184 Line::sub(SUMOReal x, SUMOReal y) {
00185     myP1.sub(x, y);
00186     myP2.sub(x, y);

00190 
00191 Line&
00192 Line::reverse() {
00193     Position tmp(myP1);
00194     myP1 = myP2;
00195     myP2 = tmp;
00196     return *this;
00197 }

00199 
00200 SUMOReal
00201 Line::intersectsAtLength2D(const Line& v) {
00202     Position pos =
00203         GeomHelper::intersection_position(myP1, myP2, v.myP1, v.myP2);
00204     return GeomHelper::nearest_position_on_line_to_point2D(myP1, myP2, pos);
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 void
00209 Line::rotateAtP1(SUMOReal rot) {
00210     Position p = myP2;
00211     p.sub(myP1);
00212     p.reshiftRotate(0, 0, rot);
00213     p.add(myP1);
00214     myP2 = p;
00215 }
00216 
00217 
00218 void
00219 Line::rotateAround(const Position& at, SUMOReal rot) {
00220     myP1.add(-at.x(), -at.y());
00221     myP2.add(-at.x(), -at.y());
00222     {
00223         SUMOReal x = myP1.x() * cos(rot) + myP1.y() * sin(rot);
00224         SUMOReal y = myP1.y() * cos(rot) - myP1.x() * sin(rot);
00225         myP1 = Position(x, y);
00226     }
00227     {
00228         SUMOReal x = myP2.x() * cos(rot) + myP2.y() * sin(rot);
00229         SUMOReal y = myP2.y() * cos(rot) - myP2.x() * sin(rot);
00230         myP2 = Position(x, y);
00231     }
00232     myP1.add(at.x(), at.y());
00233     myP2.add(at.x(), at.y());
00234 }
